message: Starting research: outlining vendor/commercial, open-source, and network-discovery options; will gather install methods, usage, macOS support, and licensing.

Collected sources for Nmap/NSE, zmap/masscan, Wireshark/TShark, zgrab2, mbpoll/pymodbus, and vendor tools (Siemens PRONETA, Rockwell RSLinx/BOOTP, Schneider Machine Expert, HMS IPconfig, GrassMarlin). Drafting ranked list with macOS support, install, examples, and pros/cons.
